name: Lord of Alcandria: Chapter III
overview: Lord of Alcandria: Chapter III is a fantasy point & click adventure game. As in Chapter II, you play Krilok Rainwood, a scythe-wielding member of the undead. The game opens on a bright sunny morning as Krilok wakes up by the side of a winding road that leads off to a castle in the distance. He meets a group of rebels hiding out in the forest nearby, and with their help, he hatches a plan to infiltrate the King's stronghold.
